query:
INSERT INTO requirements (frameworkId, articleNumber, title, description, category, riskLevelApplicable, isMandatory) VALUES 
-- TC260 Model Safety Requirements
(3, '5.1', 'Third-Party Model Filing', 'Services using third-party foundation models must verify the model is filed with relevant oversight department.', 'Model Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '5.2', 'Generated Content Safety', 'Make safety of generated content a main evaluation indicator during training; conduct safety testing on all user inputs.', 'Model Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '5.3', 'Content Accuracy', 'Implement technical measures to ensure generated content aligns with scientific knowledge and mainstream perception.', 'Model Safety', 'all', 1),
(3, '5.4', 'Content Reliability', 'Implement measures to enhance coherence and validity of generated content.', 'Model Safety', 'all', 1),
-- TC260 Safety Measure Requirements
(3, '6.1', 'Service Suitability', 'Demonstrate necessity, applicability, and safety of GenAI services before deployment.', 'Safety Measures', 'all', 1),
(3, '6.2', 'Service Transparency', 'Disclose service limitations, model/algorithm information, and data collection practices on homepage.', 'Safety Measures', 'all', 1),
(3, '6.3', 'User Opt-Out', 'Provide users easy method to opt out of their input being used for training purposes.', 'Safety Measures', 'all', 1),
(3, '6.4', 'Content Annotation', 'AI-generated image, audio, and video content must meet national annotation requirements.', 'Safety Measures', 'all', 1),
(3, '6.5', 'Computing Security', 'Assess supply chain security of chips, software, tools; chips must support secure boot.', 'Safety Measures', 'all', 1),
(3, '6.6', 'Complaint Mechanisms', 'Establish channels for public complaints via phone, email, interactive windows, and text messages.', 'Safety Measures', 'all', 1),
(3, '6.7', 'Account Suspension', 'Suspend accounts providing illegal/unhealthy information >5 times/day or 3 consecutive times.', 'Safety Measures', 'all', 1),
(3, '6.8', 'Model Update Management', 'Establish safety management strategy for model upgrades; conduct in-house safety assessments after updates.', 'Safety Measures', 'all', 1);
